trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of custom Web Parts verbs.
trans-unit.target: 表示網頁組件動詞命令的集合。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Web Parts verbs are interactive user interface (UI) elements that are displayed in a menu or title bar of a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件動詞命令是互動式的使用者介面 (UI) 項目 Web 組件控制項功能表或標題列中顯示。

trans-unit.source: A Web Parts zone provides to a Web Parts control a standard set of verbs that are rendered in the Web Parts verb menu.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件區域 Web 組件控制項提供一組標準的 Web 組件動詞命令功能表中所呈現的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: A custom Web Parts zone or a Web Parts control can add additional verbs to this menu.
trans-unit.target: 自訂的 Web 組件區域或 Web 組件控制項可以加入至此功能表加入其他動詞。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides several standard verbs by default to all controls in a Web Parts zone, including the close and minimize verbs.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供了數個標準指令動詞，預設會將 Web 組件中的所有控制項的區域，其中包括關閉和最小化動詞。

trans-unit.source: There are standard verbs for opening, closing, editing, and minimizing a control, and other verbs for exporting a definition for the control or loading a Help file.
trans-unit.target: 沒有開啟、 關閉、 編輯和最小化控制項，以及用於匯出的定義控制項或載入的說明檔的其他指令動詞的標準動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: You can create new verbs that are added to the Web Parts verb menu.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立新的指令動詞新增至 Web 組件動詞命令功能表。

trans-unit.source: A control can inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class and add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 控制項可以繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>基底類別，並加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>物件加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: This collection can then be added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此集合可以再加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>控制項的集合。

trans-unit.source: A control can also implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface and override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 也可以實作控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>介面，並覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can then use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection> collection to add custom verbs to a control.
trans-unit.target: 然後您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection>来加入至控制項的自訂動詞命令集合。

trans-unit.source: This class implements <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>, which provides a non-generic, read-only collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會實作<xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>，其中提供非泛型唯讀集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立空<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: To create a new instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection> using an existing collection of Web Parts verbs, you can use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.%23ctor%28System.Collections.ICollection%29>.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection>使用現有的 Web 組件的動詞集合，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.%23ctor%28System.Collections.ICollection%29>。

trans-unit.source: An object derived from <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> that contains a set of Web Parts verbs.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 的物件，其中包含一組 Web 組件動詞。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" /> class using the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的集合，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection> using the specified verbs collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式建立的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection>使用指定的動詞集合。

trans-unit.source: This collection can be any object derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains a set of Web Parts verbs.
trans-unit.target: 此集合可以是任何物件衍生自<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>，其中包含 Web 組件動詞命令集。

trans-unit.source: An existing <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 現有的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: An object derived from <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> that contains a set of Web Parts verbs.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 的物件，其中包含一組 Web 組件動詞。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" /> class using the specified collections.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的集合，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used to combine two Web Parts verb collections.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可以用來結合兩個 Web 組件的動詞集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> to be found.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches the Web Parts verb collection for the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋 Web 組件動詞集合，找出指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection contains the Web Parts verb; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合包含 Web 組件動詞，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information on using this method, see its base method, <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.System%23Collections%23IList%23Contains%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱其基底方法， <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.System%23Collections%23IList%23Contains%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The array that elements are to be copied to.
trans-unit.target: 要複製項目的目標陣列。

trans-unit.source: The index where copying should begin.
trans-unit.target: 要開始進行複製的索引處。

trans-unit.source: Copies elements of the collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將集合的元素複製至以指定的索引為起始點的指定陣列。

trans-unit.source: For more information on using this method, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an empty collection that you can use instead of creating a new one.
trans-unit.target: 指定您可以使用的空集合，而不必建立新的空集合。

trans-unit.source: This static field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個靜態欄位是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: A static, read-only, empty instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection> reduces memory usage in cases where you want an empty collection instance to return the proper object type from a method or to compare the instance with another object, but you do not need to add members to the instance.
trans-unit.target: 靜態、 唯讀、 空白執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection>可減少在您要從方法傳回適當的物件類型，或比較執行個體與另一個物件，空集合執行個體，但您不需要將成員加入的情況下的記憶體使用量執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> to be located.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified Web Parts verb and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire collection.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的 Web 組件動詞，然後傳回在整個集合中第一個符合以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the Web Parts verb.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件動詞的索引。

trans-unit.source: For more information on using this method, see <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.System%23Collections%23IList%23IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.System%23Collections%23IList%23IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the Web Parts verb to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要進行擷取之 Web 組件動詞的索引值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Web Parts verb from the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 從指定之索引的集合取得 Web 組件動詞。

trans-unit.source: A Web Parts verb from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取自集合的 Web 組件動詞。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get a Web Parts verb if you know the index of the verb in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來取得 Web 組件動詞命令，如果您知道集合中的指令動詞索引。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.Contains%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to locate a particular verb in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.Contains%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection.IndexOf%2A>要在集合中尋找特定動詞的方法。
